# is-svg

> Check if a string or buffer is [SVG](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scalable_Vector_Graphics)

## Install

```
$ npm install is-svg
```

## Usage

```js
const isSvg = require('is-svg');

isSvg('<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill="#00CD9F"/></svg>');
//=> true
```
